issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

query ran:
{noformat}
select
   v1.s,
   v2.s,
   v1.intrvl1 
from
   ( select
      s,
      (cast(dt as date) - cast(ts as date)) as intrvl1 
   from
      vectortab10korc ) v1 
join
   (
      select
         s ,
         (cast(dt as date) - cast(ts as date)) as intrvl2 
      from
         vectorparttab10korc 
   ) v2 
      on v1.intrvl1 = v2.intrvl2 
      and v1.s = v2.s;
{noformat}

fields.summary: with vectorization enabled join operation involving interval_day_time fails

comments.body:
1) Needs some better common routines for mapping primitive category to vector type.
2) Could add INTERVAL_YEAR_MONTH case in Q file, too?

Do you still need the isXFamily methods with this? (since you switched to case statements)

Otherwise +1 assuming tests pass.

{color:red}Overall{color}: -1 at least one tests failed
